# Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.DateSeparator.dash

**Case**

Specifies a dash character separating year, month, and day components in an ISO 8601 date format style.

## Declaration

```swift
case dash
```

## Discussion

The `rawValue` of `dash` is “`-`”.

## Specifying ISO 8601 Format Style Date Separators

- **Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.DateSeparator.omitted**: Specifies no separator between the year, month, and day components in an ISO 8601 date format style.
